summary: An imperial marriageable follower in the likeness of Henry Cavill
descriptionHtml:
Well not much to say but I'm a fan of Henry Cavill. He's a Skyrim fan...so why not quest with him??? <3 I did a previous mod of him but when he was younger; this mod is more with his current look. Enjoy!

Location: Shor's Stone outside by the campfire

Required mods:
Apachii Male Hairstyles - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?

Recommended Mods to get the screenshot looks:
Better Males - Nudes, Faces and Hairstyles - (No more blocky faces, Younger Faces merged with men, and underwear versions)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?

For Installation:
Drag and Drop the files into your Data folder. Typically, this folder is found:
C://Program Files/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data
author: Kaolinite77
